translations.translation: We have recorded all things in writing.
We have kept account of everything in a book.
And everything have We recorded in a Book.
However, We have recorded everything in a book.
And We have kept recorded everything in a Book, accounted for.
And all things We have recorded in a Book.
And We have recorded everything in a book,
and everything We have numbered in a Book.
Everything have We recorded in a Book.
but We have recorded everything in a Book.
And everything We have recorded in a book.
and We have figured everything in a Book.
And all things have We preserved on record.
And all things We have recorded in a Book.
and everything We have numbered in a Book.
But We have enumerated everything in writing.
But all things We have enumerated in writing.

[78:29] and everything, in the way of deeds, have We kept count of, have We recorded precisely, in a Book, as [individual] written records in the Preserved Tablet, in order to requite [creatures] in accordance with them, including [the record of] their denial of the Qur’ān.
Everything) regarding the works of the children of Adam (have We recorded in a Book) We wrote it down in the Guarded or Preserved Tablet.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ كِتَاباً } أي عِلماً

translations.translation: And His saying, {And We have recorded everything in a book} [means] knowledge.

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ أحصيناه } أي: حفظناه وضبطناه { كِتاباً } 
 مصدر مؤكد لأحصينا لأنَّ الإحصاء والكتابة من وادٍ واحد
 أو: حال بمعنى مكتوب في اللوح المحفوظ أو في صحف الحفظة
 والجملة اعتراض
